A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I'm a bit surprised at some of the negativity I am seeing. We saw the movie Thursday night. The pacing is solid and the story is innovative. The callbacks are clear\, but not invasive.

Everything about The Last Jedi is about renewal\, stepping past the trappings of the institutions that have enslaved the galaxy for 1000 years.

This film is not for the shallow. While embracing everything that has been Star Wars for 40 years\, it also asks us to take the next step and look inside to find out who *we* are.

The theater was packed\, which is unusual for the early premier night\, and the movie closed to a standing ovation. Opinions here seem to be all over the map\, but everyone who shared the theater with us enjoyed it.
